title: new skin ideas
body:
ok these are just my skin ideas for champs. AGAIN...this is my personal opinion with what I would like.

1-FBI or CIA Lucian (Lucian in a tuxedo essesntially)

2-Disco Taric (taric in a classic seventies white dance tux with high heel boots)

3- Panda volibear (reskin of volibear with white and black patches like a panda)

4 Human Alistar- (my personal favourite because he is my favourite champ. a buffy gym junkie guy, remove the horns and give him a human complexion for his skin and make his skull like a humans one)

5-unforgiven ekko (ekko with dark red eyes and and purple darkish sword as well as black clothes of somewhat

6- Bartender singed- (always mixing and mixing and mixing. Hell even makes a joke about "shaken not stirred") white shirt with red suspenders and like maybe a yellow poison?)

cheers guys

replies.body:
Adding onto these ideas.

1. Pulsefire Annie.
2. Academy Annie.
3. Slayer Annie.
4. Omega Squad Annie.
5. DJ Annie. (when you ult, the beat drops).
6. Drop Bear Annie.

Riot should add all of these. Annie hasn't had a new skin in like 5 years.
She just got a new a skin are you on mushrooms?

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LsNLYmAd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-02T07:59:41.060+0000)
>
> She just got a new a skin are you on mushrooms?

What skin?

FUCKING HEXTECH!

And Sweet Heart was at the start of last year too.
